sqlMap.select: select * from question_kind where project_id = #projectId# or project_id = -1
sqlMap.insert: insert into question_kind (name,description,project_id,creator_id) values(#name#,#description#,#projectId#,#creatorId#) select @@IDENTITY as id
sqlMap.select: select scenario.* from question_relate_scenario join scenario on question_relate_scenario.scenario_id = scenario.scenario_id where question_id = #value#
select question.* from question join question_relate_scenario on question.id = question_relate_scenario.question_id where question_relate_scenario.scenario_id = #scenarioId#

select question.* from question join question_relate_scenario on question.id = question_relate_scenario.question_id where question_relate_scenario.scenario_id = #scenarioId# and question.status = 'wait'

select question.* from (question_relate_scenario join scenario on question_relate_scenario.scenario_id = scenario.scenario_id ) join question on question_relate_scenario.question_id = question.id where scenario.project_id = #projectId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into question (title,description,qkind_id,user_id) values(#title#,#description#,#qkindId#,#userId#) select @@IDENTITY as id
insert into question_relate_scenario (scenario_id,question_id) values(#scenarioId#,#questionId#) select @@IDENTITY as id
insert into question_vote ( question_id , user_id,vote) values( #questionId#,#userId#,#vote#) select @@IDENTITY as id
sqlMap.select: select vote from question_vote where question_id = #questionId# and user_id = #userId#
select sum(vote) from question_vote where question_id = #value#
sqlMap.update: update question set status = 'fixed' where question.id = #id#
